name: aws
description: Perform operations on your AWS resources using an LLM.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: This is the access key ID for your AWS account, required for authenticating requests to AWS services.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: This is the secret access key for your AWS account, used in conjunction with the access key ID to authenticate requests.

AWS_REGION.description: This specifies the AWS region you want to use for your operations. It defaults to `us-east-1` if not provided.
